original_text: If an honest person falls down seven times, he will still stand up again. But when trouble comes to a wicked person, that is the end of him.
korean_text: 대저 의인은 일곱 번 넘어질지라도 다시 일어나려니와 악인은 재앙으로 말미암아 엎드러지느니라

sentences.original_text: If an honest person falls down seven times
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 정직한 사람이 일곱 번 넘어진다 해도

sentences.original_text: he will still stand up again
But when trouble comes to a wicked person
that is the end of him
